name: Assault Roll
tooltip:
Rolls toward a target location dodging all attacks and gaining a major attack speed increase for next <d ref="duckiesHeroRykerRoll_ASBuffStacksApplier.stacks" style="Blue"/> attacks. These attacks will also briefly stun light enemies.

The effect expires in <d ref="duckiesHeroRykerRoll_ASBuffStacks.duration"/> seconds if not used up.
